name: Angry Space Bees
description:
Features of the game:
  • Space bees, they will find you and attack you.
  • Space cacti throwing out dangerous spikes.
  • Stun guns.
  • Endless rounds of ammunition.
  • Progress.
  • Space dust, yes — this is very important for us we worked for a long time and it turned out very beautiful :) .



Basic gameplay:
Your task is to break through the dangerous space insects, jump into the interstellar teleport and fight the aliens again.
Space cactus and stun gun can be bypassed if you do not fly into the area of their control, but the space Bees will get you, move to the hive and destroy it!
